# Temas

```{r}
library(reticulate)
library(gcookbook)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

## Crear el gr√°fico base
```{r}

hw_plot <- cars %>%  ggplot(aes(x = speed, y = dist)) +
  geom_point()

```

## Tema por defecto
```{r}

hw_plot +
  theme_grey()

```

## Tema blanco y negro
```{r}

hw_plot +
  theme_bw()

```

## Tema minimal
```{r}

hw_plot +
  theme_minimal()

```

## Tema clasico
```{r}
hw_plot +
  theme_classic()
```
